interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre gray Wig Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women
Review Date: 2021/01/05
Store: Altaba
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'UPC': '788436507620'}
Review Text: This ombré style is more like bad roots for days in need of a dye job immediately. I feel like mine was almost all dark with the ends being light. I can’t recommend it because you don’t really get what’s pictured. It’s ok otherwise, almost on the verge of being a Halloween level wig. It’s not as thick as you’d like it to be but not thin enough you’re seeing the wig cap. The wig cap is the standard size so it’s not to small or tight but mine sat weird and tried to bubble a bit on my head. It had to be left on a wig head inside out for days to correct it. I feel like you could easily find this in another brand but better.
Review Title: Kind of cheap looking
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
165G Jumbo Braiding Hair Blonde Synthetic Jumbo Braids 3 Packs
UHair
{'Package Dimensions': '13.94 x 6.69 x 3.74 inches; 1.19 Pounds'}
I wanted to make my own Rapunzel wig but cwas dissatisfied with the cost from Arda you only get 1 for $10 plus shipping and I needed 3 of them. I got these 3 for half the cost I originally bought from Arda. I kept the Arda ones until these came in just to check quality and they’re literally the exact same thing. So I sent the Arda ones back. I think the wig came out beautifully and you can’t even tell this was 3 separate braids at one point. Definitely would buy again! I followed a tutorial I found on google to make the wig, then added my own touches by including the lights!
Perfect base for Rapunzel Braids!
Cute Cartoon Makeup Brushes Set - 8pcs Fairy Makeup Brushes with Soft Pink Fiber and Metallic Handle for Eyebrow, Eyeshadow, Foundation, Blending and Lips, Great Gift for Sister Girlfriend (Style B)
rongji jewelry
{'Brand': 'rongji jewelry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult,Teen', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 3.8 x 1.3 inches; 5.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '745695122377'}
VERY sturdy brushes. I was completely thrown at how sturdy/heavy these brushes are. I was totally expecting cheap light plastic handles that would break easily but that isn’t the case at all. The bristle portion of them is nice to because they’re not to thick or thin, easy to clean, and don’t shed off. Super cute Designs, I know who bts is but I’m not like a super fan or own any of their music to be honest but they definitely have quality merch as proven by these brushes. I don’t really care for the bag they came in, it’s nice enough but feels cheap in comparison to the brushes themselves. I just have them in my makeup bag instead.
Very good quality
Forfeels Long Straight Black Wig Synthetic Wigs for Women Natural Middle Part Lace Wig Heat Resistant Fiber Natural Looking Wig (30inch, Black Color)
forfeels
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Forfeels', 'Package Dimensions': '9.33 x 6.34 x 2.36 inches; 10.58 Ounces', 'UPC': '791262892525'}
Not a lace front wig. I wouldn’t even consider it a partial lace front. The only place it had lace was right at the part. It’s not a horrible or even bad wig. But it’s not a lace front. The fibers were soft but did shed. It’s comfortable enough to wear, but a little tight if you already have a lot of hair going under it. Can’t recommend it to any cosplayers out there looking at this for a costume, I think styling it may be hard with the way it’s wefted and fact it’s not actually a lace front if that’s what you’re looking for.
Not actually a lace front wig
Cortex International Black Series Duo Platinum 1.25-Inch & 0.5 Inch Travel Size Gemstone Infused Ceramic Plates Duet Flat Iron (Rose Wood)
Cortex
{'Shape': 'Round', 'Brand': 'Cortex', 'Hair Type': 'Dry, Curly, Straight', 'Material': 'Wood,Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.19 x 4.13 x 3.98 inches; 2.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'CTX-DUO-125RW', 'UPC': '819804020950', 'Manufacturer': 'International'}
The color is great, the actual product not so much and not worth the price. You could easily buy a better one at big lots for less then half the cost. The full size definitely did not get as hot as it should have and didn’t retain the heat. It wouldn’t straighten my hair. The mini got to temp but would take you forever to do your whole head. It was not as wide as described, the mini is more like a bangs straightener then a mini straightener which is fine for baby hairs and of course bangs. Over all a disappointment given I like the color so much. I’ll be tossing the full size but keeping the mini.
Doesn’t get to or hold temp
Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer
leuxe
{'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'}
Super easy to hold and use, came in great packaging, and works really well! My only complaint would be that it adds yet another recharging product to my life and I wish it came with a docking system so I could always be charging it rather then a cube/cord combo I have to remember to plug in. I don’t use it every day, every other but it works well with my daily routine when I do.
It works!
24 Inches Synthetic Long Curly Blonde Wig Natural Wavy Hair NONE Lace Heat Resistant Wigs for Women Cosplay Costume
AILIWEI
{'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AILIWEI', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '710731915817'}
Nice color and length, with some styling I think this could look very natural. It sheds a bit so I recommend a good brushing with a wig brush. Overall a very good quality wig for the price. Standard wig cap so on larger heads may feel tight.
Nice and natural
Juziviee Brown Wigs for Women, 13'' Short Brown Bob Wig with Bangs, Natural Looking Soft Synthetic Hair Wig, Cute Wigs for Party Cosplay Halloween AD016BR1
Juziviee
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Juziviee', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.48 x 1.73 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '824381921644'}
A nice affordable option for cosplayers that need a very blunt style wig and don’t want to style something themselves. To me some spots on the back could be a little more wefted/thicker but it never shows the wig cap so it’s not too thin. Wig cap is a good fit/size with good stretch making it comfortable to wear
A good fit
SHINYSHOW 14'' Women's Party Wig Short Wavy Wig with Bangs Synthetic Cosplay Wig Average Size (Fresh Blue)
SHINYSHOW
{'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'SHINYSHOW', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.98 x 8.46 x 2.09 inches; 8.47 Ounces'}
Cute but a little on the thin side, I wish it had been just a bit longer in length. For the price it’s not a bad budget friendly cosplay option. I used it for a casual catbug cosplay for a zoom event. The wig cap in my opinion felt a bit small and gave me a headache after 2 hours. It’s not super thick but wasn’t so thin you saw the cap either.
Cute

profile:
The user continues to express a strong passion for crafting, custom hairstyling, and makeup, particularly in the context of wig-making. Their recent purchase of a long wavy wig highlights a dedication to budget-friendly, aesthetically pleasing products, while also revealing a discerning taste for quality and consistency. However, their experience with the latest wig underscores a recurring concern with thickness and overall appearance, as they noted it resembled a low-quality product.

The user maintains a preference for wigs that require minimal styling and fit comfortably, which aligns with previous experiences involving wig caps. They seek beauty products that enhance their routine while being visually appealing and durable, demonstrated by their ongoing pursuit of high-quality makeup brushes and skincare tools.

Additionally, the user values detailed user reviews and instructional content, showcasing their commitment to informed purchasing decisions. While their quest for functionality, aesthetic allure, and comfort remains steadfast, their latest interaction highlights an increasing sensitivity to how products visually match promotional images and the overall quality expectations. Ultimately, they remain dedicated to personal expression through carefully selected items that align with their taste and values, reflecting a nuanced approach to beauty and crafting.
